channel.title: How to change server message
channel.description: ok i got this problem with server messages that like say hello walcome to (servername) so i changed it at client.java and compiled but nothing happend i still get the same 1 as before?

item.title: How to change server message
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:3, topic:365113”]make sure your editing the right thing, you might be editing a command instead, or a interface, make sure your editing your login message and not sometime else[/quote] i am sure becouse i done it before on a diferent server and it worked

Read full topic

item.title: How to change server message
item.dc:creator: @Perses_Pkers Perses Pkers
item.description:
@Perses_Pkers wrote:

hmmmmmmmmmm… go into server.java and change it again and compile again but this time compile client as well… and if it still don’t work (Since this happend to me…) make sure The CLIENT’s And the SOURCE’s IPs are the same…

Read full topic
